sections.heading: Employee; extend coverage; when
sections.text: Sections 48-115, 48-115.01, and 48-146 shall be so construed as to effectuate their general purpose to extend workers' compensation coverage to additional employees and officers as soon as the same may be done under the Constitution of Nebraska.SourceLaws 1967, c. 291
